name: Santa Monica FC
overview: This is a football management game similar to other productions and created in 1998 in AMOS Professional. In it, you guide small Santa Monica FC from fourth league to the very top. Twelve leagues to choose from. Polish, English and German versions included. Choose your line up and position. You need 3 points for win, play each team twice. The best three teams will be promoted, the bottom 3 will be relegated. Domestic cup is played in one leg rounds. In case of a tie, the game will go into extra time until the first scored goal. All European cups are played in a cup system with two leg rounds with same rules for a tie. Substitutions can be made after 7 minutes of game time. Manage finances, sign new sponsorship deals!
